sentences.sContent: He took the Washington - New York shuttle.
sentences.sCn: 他乘坐华盛顿－纽约的往返班机。

sentences.sContent: A shuttle bus operates to and from the beach of San Benedetto.
sentences.sCn: 有穿梭巴士往返于圣贝内代托海滩。

sentences.sContent: There’s a shuttle service from the city center to the airport.
sentences.sCn: 从市中心到机场有穿梭班车服务。

synos.tran: [航]航天飞机；穿梭；[纺]梭子；穿梭班机、公共汽车等

phrases.pCn: 航天飞机（往返于地球和太空站之间运载人和物资的）
班车（在较短距离之间往返的交通车）；豪华轿车
n. 短程运输；往返大巴服务；区间飞航
穿梭式矿车；梭车；往返架车

remMethod.val: shut(关闭) ＋ tle → 封闭的空间 → 航天飞机

trans.tranOther: a plane, bus, or train that makes regular short journeys between two places
to travel frequently between two places
